text: The Selenidiidae are a family of parasitic alveolates in the phylum Apicomplexa. ==Taxonomy== There are five genera in this family. ==History== This family was created by Brasil in 1907.Brasil L (1907) Recherches sur le cycle évolutif des Selenidiidae, grégarines parasites d'Annélides Polychètes. I. La schizogonie et la croissance des gamétocytes. Archives de zoologie expérimentale et générale ==Description== ==References== Category:Apicomplexa families
title: Selenidiidae
